title: How to fix Out of border display
content:
While trying to watch IGTV on Instagram, or while playing some games and using some apps, it seems that I'm loosing a part of picture. Sometimes like in IGTV, a part of video (picture) is just out of phone's display area and I can not see like 10% of that all around the edges.
In some other apps like in "Simply piano" picture is completely in the borders, but the content of the page is mixed up or a part of it is omitted. It seems to be a problem with the pixel 4 xl's display size or aspect ratio since the apps are working perfectly on other devices. That Brid in the picture is supposed to be Bridge and the Chor in the picture is Chorus.
And you can clearly see the omitted B of BBC in the other picture
What is the fix ?!
